pageContext.claim: “Read the AOC PLUS 3 statements on their hatred of Jews and Israel. Check out Rep. Omar (the great people of Minnesota won’t stand for this).”
pageContext.analysis: Trump regularly attacks four freshman congresswomen of color: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Rashida Tlaib, Ilhan Omar and Ayanna Pressley. Omar has made anti-Semitic remarks, but Trump otherwise exaggerates.
